name: Wait a Minute Mr. Postman! (PC)
description:
1. "YOU'VE GOT MAIL"

Help Mr. Postman to make his way to the postbox, by moving the platforms!

So press [R] if you get stuck!

2. CONTROLS

ActionKeysMove Platform [WASD] / [ARROW KEYS]
Rotate Platform
Hold [SPACE] and [WASD] / [ARROW KEYS]
Retry Level
[R]

3. PROJECT STATUS

This game was initially created for Mark Brown's GMTK 2018.

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2018

The theme for this jam was:

[GENRE, but you can't MECHANIC]

So, this game is a JUMP 'N RUN, but you CAN'T JUMP OR RUN!

We kept working on it for a couple of weeks, and consider it as finished!

4. CREDITS
